unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for infusing fresh talent. NIT Trichy consistently delivers high-caliber graduates. We should proactively engage with placement cells. Streamlining the process, like in "3 Idiots", can significantly improve efficiency. Consider offering attractive packages, starting at Rs. 10 Lakhs per annum, plus benefits. The recruitment drive should cover metros and Tier-II cities like Pune and Jaipur. A robust screening process is essential for identifying the best fit. Let's aim to onboard candidates by November 15th, 2024. A detailed plan will be circulated soon.
normalised: Campus hiring is crucial for infusing fresh talent. N I T Trichy consistently delivers high-caliber graduates. We should proactively engage with placement cells. Streamlining the process, like in "three Idiots", can significantly improve efficiency. Consider offering attractive packages, starting at rupee ten lakhs per annum, plus benefits. The recruitment drive should cover metros and Tier-two cities like Pune and Jaipur. A robust screening process is essential for identifying the best fit. Let's aim to onboard candidates by November fifteenth, two thousand and twenty four. A detailed plan will be circulated soon.
